description: '''David Nothaker''' (born September 23, 1989), better known by his stage name '''Notaker''' (stylized as '''Ð˜ O T A K E R'''), is an American DJ and producer based in [[St. Louis]], [[Missouri]]. He is best known for his midtempo-progressive style and for breakout singles like "[[Infinite (Notaker song)|Infinite]]", "[[Shimmer (Notaker song)|Shimmer]]", and "[[The Storm (Notaker song)|The Storm]]" which have amassed over 11 million, 2.5 million, and 3.7 million streams on [[Spotify]] respectively. Notaker has performed at music festivals across the United States including Global Dance Festival in Denver, Das Energy in Utah, and Freaky Deaky in Texas.
